verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ab' val jun in lesal tik. In gana to sk'och vav t'ayach.
Manh ach b'at mican t'ayin ayic ay in och ilk'olal. Elocab' t'a a k'ool ab'an in lesal. Comonoc elanhchamel tzach tak'vi t'ayin ayic tzach vavtani.
Van slajviem in q'uinal icha val satem te' tab'. Van stz'ab'at in b'aquil icha te' cuxk'ak' svab'i.
Manhxalaj yip in pixan svab'i, icha val taquinh ank'ultak in ticnaic. Maxtzac ochlaj in vejel.
Ix och lotzan in tz'umal t'a in b'aquil yuj b'aj tzin te oq'ui.
Lajan in icha junok nok' cujub' t'a tzinan lu'um, ma icha nok' xoch' b'aj ay te' k'atac pat.
Max ochlaj in vayanh. Lajan in yet' nok' much tzek' sch'ocojil t'a chontac pat.
Ha eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, junjun k'u stzuntzej kus in k'ool eb'. Tzin yak'anpax b'inaj eb' t'a scatab'.
Ichato tik'aq'uil taanh in vael tzin wa''a. Scalej sb'a yal in sat yet' tas svuq'uej.
Yujnhej a k'ak'alk'olal yet' yoval a k'ol t'ayin, ix in ik'anq'ue vaan, ix lajvi chi' ix in a yumancanb'at t'a najat.
Icha junok enhul vanxo satemi, icha val chi' in q'uinal. Van in tacjiem icha val anh ank'ultak svab'i.
Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a masanil tiempo. Ol ach nachajnhejcot t'a masanil q'uinal.
Cotanh, ok'ocab' a k'ol t'a Sion. Toxo ix ja stiempoal to tzak'xi a wach'k'olal t'ay.
Ha onh a checab' onh tik xajan Sion cuuj, wach'chom lanhchajnac emi. Tzonh oq'ui yujto ix jujiemi.
Masanil nación yet' eb' winh sreyal yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ol xiv eb' t'a stziquiquial Jehová te b'inajnac.
Ayic ol b'oxiq'ue Sion, ol sch'oxan sb'ha t'a skal stziquiquial ta'.
A' ol chaan slesal eb' malaj mach skolwaj yet'oc. Manh ol spatiquejel-laj eb', ayic ol yalan sb'a eb' t'ay.
Tz'ib'chajocab'kan t'a yol ch'anh uum tas ol sk'uloc Jehová yic wach' a eb' manto aljoclaj, ol yal wach' lolonel eb' t'ay.
Ato t'a sk'ojnub' Jehová t'a satcha’anh ol yilanemta lum lum tik,
yic wach' ol b'o yaj b'aj stevi eb' presovum. Ol scolancanel eb' winh preso yaji, eb' ayoch chamel t'a yib'anh,
yic ol aljoquel yab'ixal t'a Sion, yic tz'alchajpax wach' lolonel t'ay t'a Jerusalén.
Yuj chi' ol ja masanil nación ul yaq'uem sb'ha t'a Jehová chi'.
Ix yik'anel vip Jehová ayic ayto in q'uinal, ix tzap in q'uinal yuj.
Ix valan t'ay: Ach in Diosal, manh ak' tzap in q'uinal. Ha val a q'uinal a ach tik, malaj slajvub'.
Atax t'a yichb’anel a b'onaccanem yich yol yib'anhk’inal tik, a ach pax a b'onaccan satcha’anh.

Ol satel masanil juntzanh tik, a achxo jun, ayachnhejeq'ui. Ha juntzanh tik ol ixtaxoc, icha sk'ab'ik'och junok k'apac, ol a q'uexcaneli, icha val sq'uexanel junok sk'a pichul eb' anima, syumancaneli.
Ha achxo jun, anheja' aji, malaj b'ak'uinh ol ach sateloc.
Ha eb' cuninal a onh a checab' onh tik, junk'olal ol aj eb' t'a ichanh. Yuj a colval, malaj tas ol ik'an eb'.
